mutation.effect.levitation.desc: Every 15 seconds there's a small chance you'll randomly start levitating
mutation.effect.glowing.desc: Makes you glowing, revealing you to nearby enemies
mutation.effect.fast_metabolism.desc: Gain extra Food and Saturation from eating
mutation.effect.slow_metabolism.desc: Gain less Food and Saturation from eating
mutation.effect.corrosive_touch.desc: Hits against enemies have a 50% chance to inflict Poison
mutation.effect.frail_body.desc: Hits against you have a 25% chance to inflict Poison
mutation.effect.explosive.desc: Take extra damage from Fire sources, if you die from a Fire source you explode
mutation.effect.archer.desc: Deal +25% extra ranged damage, -25% melee damage
mutation.effect.scales.desc: +25% Armour and Armour Toughness but -25% all Healing
mutation.effect.thorns.desc: Reflect 25% of damage taken onto attacker, -25% Armour
mutation.effect.strong_legs.desc: Leap forward whenever you jump while sprinting
mutation.effect.iron_gut.desc: Immune to the negative effects of any dangerous Food
mutation.effect.alcoholic.desc: Drinking any potion grants you temporary Absorption
mutation.effect.blood_sucking.desc: Heal for 25% of the Damage you deal, -25% Max Health
mutation.effect.undead.desc: +100% Max Health, -25% Healing & immune to Poison
mutation.effect.hooves.desc: +100 Sprint Speed when nothing is in your hands
mutation.effect.hydrophilic.desc: Can no longer eat Food, instead drink water, swim or stand in the rain to refill food
mutation.effect.potassium.desc: Drinking Water and standing in Water for 3 seconds causes you to Explode
mutation.effect.claws.desc: +3 to +10 Damage when nothing is in your hands
mutation.effect.sharp_senses.desc: Every 3 seconds your next attack will deal +100% damage, but -25% damage when this isn't applied
mutation.effect.turtle.desc: After blocking an attack your next attack will do +100% Damage
mutation.effect.scarring.desc: Grants Regeneration every 20 seconds, taking damage will reduce this Interval and increase its Duration
mutation.effect.thick_fur.desc: Passively heal in cold climates, +25% hunger drain in hot climates
mutation.effect.cold_blood.desc: Passively heal in hot climates, +25% hunger drain in cold climates
mutation.effect.wool.desc: Grow a block of Wool every minute, maximum of 10
mutation.effect.herbivore.desc: +25% Food from Plant food, -25% Food from Meat food
mutation.effect.carnivore.desc: +25% Food from Meat food, -25% Food from Plant food
